game.name: Pixel Runner
game.description:
Where are you, friends? We have brought to you a something unique yet exciting activity brand new pixel game to explore during your vacant hours! Are you ready to take up this cute challenge and surprise your friends with your utmost skill? Join Pixel Runner and show the world that you are a true fan of action-packed running games! Your enrolment in this free online running challenge will take you to a pixel city that is full of obstacles and hindrances. Avoid the dangerous obstacles and deadly traps to ensure your win!
Do not forget to perform well to get 3 stars by reaching the finishing line on time in this exciting level runner game! A hyperactive dog is anxiously seeking your help. Assist it to get through multiple addictive and challenging levels! All dogs love hanging out in a big backyard. However, this dog finds it pretty difficult to find the way towards his comfortable house. You have to help it to get through a number of obstacles to reunite it with its lovely place. Choose your level and get ready to have fun!
In this free online HTML5 runner game, there are 5 different levels to explore. Move left and right with the help of A and D keys and you can move around using the WASD keys! Avoid drowning by jumping over the gaps and keep your character safe as long as you can clear the level! The top left corner of the screen will show you the status about the health of your character. Take a long breath and begin browsing through our extensive collection of online running games!
